type: vehicle service jacks and jack stands
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: RFP for 24 medium hydraulic service jacks, 24 heavy hydraulic service jacks, 32 medium jack stands, and 32 heavy jack stands
description: For training purposes, the Royal Canadian Electrical Mechanical Engineering School requires vehicle service jacks and jack stands to raise, lower, and support a variety of vehicles in both size and weight.  The Department of Public Works and Government Services is soliciting bids for the purchase of these vehicle service jacks and jack stands.
duration_in_months: Il n'y a pas de durée précise
full_summary:
# **Title and Reference**
- **Title (English):** Vehicle Service Jacks and Jack Stands 
- **Title (French):** Crics d'entretien et chandelles de soutien pour véhicules
- **Reference Number (English):** WS3749868048
- **Reference Number (French):** WS3749868048

# **Purchase Requirements**
The Department of National Defence requires a purchase of the following goods:
- 24 medium hydraulic service jacks
- 24 heavy hydraulic service jacks
- 32 medium jack stands
- 32 heavy jack stands

These goods will be used at the Royal Canadian Electrical Mechanical Engineering School (RCEME School) to support vehicle technician training.

# **Request for Proposal Details**
- **Tender Status:** Expired
- **Procurement Category:** Goods
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Solicitation Number (English):** WS3749868048
- **Solicitation Number (French):** WS3749868048
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 22, 2022, at 14:00 (EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 31, 2023
- **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence (DND)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region, NCR)
- **Contact Information:**
   - Name: Vashti Ramnarine (SPAC/PSPC)
   - Email: vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

# **Trade Agreements**
This purchase is subject to various trade agreements, including the following:
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CTPA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (FAL-CH)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (FAL-CO)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

# **Notice and Attachment**
The notice for this procurement can be found at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14653159?extsite=MTQ2NTMxNTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MD
